post.title: Budget Buddy
post.description: A simple budgeting application made for Android OS.
post.content: This project was my first of many things. This was my first experience with application development and in a collaborative coding environment. Although the application needs a lot of work, it was an amazing learning experience. I learned about programming in a team setting and version control.
